301: Percentage of recycled input materials used to manufacture the organization's primary products and services
302: Total fuel consumption within the organization from non-renewable energy sources, in joules or multiples, including types of fuel used
304: Total number of species listed on the national preservation list and the IUCN Red List with habitats in areas affected by the organization's operations
305: Gross direct GHG emissions (Scope 1) in tonnes of CO2 equivalent
306: Total weight of waste generated in tons and a breakdown of this total by waste composition
308: Number of suppliers evaluated regarding environmental impacts
